text: 3rd millennium BC in music - 2nd millennium BC in music - 1st millennium BC in music == Events == * 2000 BC - Percussion instruments are added to Egyptian orchestras. * 2000 BC - The trumpet is played in Denmark. * 1500 BC - Harps are played in Egypt. * 1500 BC - Guitar, lyre, trumpet, and tambourine are used by the Hittites. * 1400 BC - the Hurrian song is engraved on a clay tablet. ==See also== List of years in music ==References== Music
title: 2nd millennium BC in music
